gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 144, Knicks 122
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers scored a season-high 144 points on their way to a 144-122 win over the Knicks. Kawhi Leonard led the Clippers with 36 points, seven rebounds, and four assists as Paul George (25 points, four rebounds, seven assists) and James Harden (10 points, 12 assists) totaled 35 points. Jalen Brunson (22 points, seven rebounds, six assists) and Julius Randle (22 points) led the Knicks in the loss. The Clippers have now won seven consecutive games and improve to 15-10 on the year as the Knicks move to 14-11.
